Web Application¶

Package project

This package defines the application.

project.__init__.create_app(config_env)[source]¶

Generate application based on configuration environment

Parameters

config_env (config.Config) – which configuration environment is used to generate application

Returns

application

Return type

Flask

project.__init__.init_extensions(app)[source]¶

Bind each Flask extension to the Flask application instance. Configure Login manager for multi-login system.

Parameters

app (Flask) – application

project.__init__.register_blueprints(app)[source]¶

Register each Blueprints with the Flask application instance.

Parameters

app (Flask) – application
